content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --STAT
      operator: equal_to
      value: NOT DONE
    - name: --REASND
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.280
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when --STAT="NOT DONE" and --REASND is not populated
Outcome:
  Message: When --STAT is "NOT DONE", --REASND must be populated.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '280'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Whenever MISTAT is “NOT DONE”; MIREASND should provide
                  the reason for not completing the evaluation as scheduled in the
                  study plan
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 6.3.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - LB
      - MI

json.Description: Trigger error when --STAT="NOT DONE" and --REASND is not populated

Outcome.Message: When --STAT is "NOT DONE", --REASND must be populated.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Whenever MISTAT is “NOT DONE”; MIREASND should provide the reason for not completing the evaluation as scheduled in the study plan
